page.title: 11Leisure Activities
page.content:
There are not many amenities for the use of leisure time in Wybunbury. The village has a Village Hall, where a Youth Club and occasional village activities are held.There is a playing field equipped with swings and a roundabout; there is a disused quarry which is full of water and is used by Wybunbury Anglers.
Hough has a common which is open to anyone for leisure activities.
There are, however many local footpaths crossing the local farmland and linking areas of local interest.
The three village hosteleries advertise their activities in the local press and these include from time to time live entertainment and organised Caravan Club Rallies.
